clauses.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: In all circumstances, we may retain certain information as required by law or necessary for our legitimate operating purposes.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: We can cancel accounts, or decline to let Users use our Services.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license
clauses.description: This case applies to services under licenses that are free as in "freedom". According to the Free Software Foundation, "free software is the software that grants the user the freedom to share, study, and modify it". Furthermore, the code is entirely open source and may be used without any restriction, including for commercial purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Listudy itself is also free/libre open-source software licensed under the GNU AGPL.

case.text: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

clauses.title: Users can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
clauses.description: The service does not require users to reveal personal information for most of its website. However, it may still collect anonymous logs.
clauses.clause_text:
Users can optionally register for an account.
however, certain features are available for registered users only.

case.text: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

clauses.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: Information you delete is deleted from the live site but remains in Listudyâ€™ backups for up to one year.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: We use European Union data protection law as our baseline

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis
clauses.clause_text: Your information will only be disclosed if it is legally necessary to do so.

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your data
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: You retain your rights to any content you submit, post or create through the services including chess games.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: You can edit or delete your user provided informations at any time.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:
This privacy policy will detail:

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

clauses.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
clauses.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.
